data.title: Second Album Trailer For The Last Stand Revealed
data.meta_description: Swedish heavy metal heroes SABATON will release their brand-new, 8th studio album, The Last Stand on August 19th via Nuclear Blast. Today, the band have revealed the second album trailer. Watch it on the Nuclear Blast YouTube channel!  If you missed the first trailer, you can watch it here! A few weeks ago, SABATON released the first single called... Read more »
data.text:
Swedish heavy metal heroes SABATON will release their brand-new, 8th studio album, The Last Stand on August 19th via Nuclear Blast. Today, the band have revealed the second album trailer. Watch it on the Nuclear Blast YouTube channel!

If you missed the first trailer, you can watch it here!

A few weeks ago, SABATON released the first single called ‘The Lost Battalion’. Watch the lyric video for the track on the Nuclear Blast Youtube channel!

Get the digital single here: http://nblast.de/SabatonDownloads

The story behind the lyrics:

“The Lost Battalion” is the name given to nine companies of the United States’ 77th Division during the battle of the Argonne in 1918. Even though these 550-575 brave men were completely surrounded by the German Army and subjected to friendly artillery fire, they kept on fighting for a week until they were relieved. Of the over 500-plus soldiers who entered the Argonne Forest, only 194 walked out unscathed. The rest were killed, missing, captured, or wounded.

The record can be pre-ordered in various formats here: : http://nblast.de/SabatonLastStandNB

Or digitally: http://nblast.de/SabatonDownloads

The Last Stand can be purchased in the following editions:

– CD+DVD-DIGI

– CD

– 2LP (black, dark green)

– Digital
